verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> was the feast of the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> and of <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread: and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G2902>take<s%> him by <S%G1388>craft,<s%> and <S%G615>put<s%> him to <S%G615>death.<s%>
But they <S%G3004>said,<s%> Not <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> day, <S%G3379>lest<s%> there be an <S%G2351>uproar<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G5607>being<s%> in <S%G963>Bethany<s%> in the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G3015>leper,<s%> as he <S%G2621>sat<s%> <S%G2621>at<s%> meat, there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> an <S%G211>alabaster<s%> <S%G211>box<s%> of <S%G3464>ointment<s%> of <S%G3487>spikenard<s%> <S%G4101><s%> <S%G4185>very<s%> <S%G4185>precious;<s%> and she <S%G4937>broke<s%> the <S%G211>box,<s%> and <S%G2708>poured<s%> it <S%G2596>on<s%> his <S%G2776>head.<s%>

And there were <S%G5100>some<s%> that had <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4314>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1519>Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G684>waste<s%> of the <S%G3464>ointment<s%> <S%G1096>made?<s%>

For it <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G4097>sold<s%> for <S%G1883>more<s%> <S%G1883>than<s%> <S%G5145>three<s%> <S%G5145>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pence,<s%> and have been <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%> And they <S%G1690>murmured<s%> <S%G1690>against<s%> her.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G863>Let<s%> her <S%G863>alone;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> trouble <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> you her? she has <S%G2038>worked<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> me.

For you <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> with you <S%G3842>always,<s%> and <S%G3752>whenever<s%> you <S%G2309>will<s%> you <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> them <S%G2095>good:<s%> but me you <S%G2192>have<s%> not always. <S%G3842><s%>
She has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> she <S%G2192>could:<s%> she is <S%G4301>come<s%> <S%G4301>beforehand<s%> to <S%G3462>anoint<s%> my <S%G4983>body<s%> to the burying. <S%G1780><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> shall be <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> this <S%G2532>also<s%> that she has <S%G4160>done<s%> shall be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of for a <S%G3422>memorial<s%> of her.
And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> him to them.

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> and <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G694>money.<s%> And he <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G2122>conveniently<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> him.

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread, <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2380>killed<s%> the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you that we <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> that you may <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>passover?<s%>

And wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he shall <S%G1525>go<s%> in, <S%G2036>say<s%> you to the <S%G3611>manager<s%> of the <S%G3617>house,<s%> The <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> is the guest <S%G2646>room,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%> with my disciples? <S%G3101><s%>

And he will <S%G1166>show<s%> you a <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G508>upper<s%> <S%G508>room<s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> and <S%G2092>prepared:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2090>make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> for us.

And in the <S%G3798>evening<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> with the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>

And as they <S%G345>sat<s%> and did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1520>One<s%> of you <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> with me shall <S%G3860>betray<s%> me.
And they <S%G756>began<s%> to be <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> and to <S%G3004>say<s%> to him <S%G1520>one<s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> Is it I? and <S%G243>another<s%> said, Is it I?
And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, It is <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> that <S%G1686>dips<s%> with me in the dish. <S%G5165><s%>

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5217>goes,<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of him: but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> were it for that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he had <S%G3756>never<s%> been born. <S%G1080><s%>

And as they did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to them, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2983>Take,<s%> <S%G5315>eat:<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is my body. <S%G4983><s%>
And he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4221>cup,<s%> and when he had given <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to them: and they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drank<s%> of it.
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5124>This<s%> is my <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1632>shed<s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I will <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> of the <S%G1081>fruit<s%> of the <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> that <S%G2250>day<s%> that I <S%G4095>drink<s%> it <S%G2537>new<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when they had <S%G5214>sung<s%> an hymn, they <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

But <S%G3326>after<s%> that I am <S%G1453>risen,<s%> I will <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to a <S%G5564>place<s%> which was <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane:<s%> and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2523>Sit<s%> you <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> I shall pray. <S%G4336><s%>

<S%G1453>Rise<s%> up, let us <S%G71>go;<s%> <S%G2400>see,<s%> he that <S%G3860>betrays<s%> me is <S%G1448>at<s%> hand. <S%G1448><s%>

And as soon as he was <S%G2064>come,<s%> he <S%G4334>goes<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4461>Master,<s%> <S%G4461>master;<s%> and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him.

And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G863>forsook<s%> him, and <S%G5343>fled.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off,<s%> <S%G2193>even<s%> <S%G2080>into<s%> <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G833>palace<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest:<s%> and he <S%G4775>sat<s%> with the <S%G5257>servants,<s%> and <S%G2328>warmed<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G5457>fire.<s%>
